document_data.name: ''Mageslayer''
document_data.Description: The mace was visibly brimming with power.
document_data.History: In late {{yearlink|1357}}, ''Mageslayer'''s powers had been explained to [[Oprion Blackstone]] by [[Fzoul Chembryl]]. The first considered using it to assault a clone of [[Manshoon]] when the latter revealed himself to exist after his presumed death, but later decided against it.
